div.p: HOPE YOU CAN SHED LIGHT ON IT. THE BOOK WILL BE OUT SEPTEMBER
23rd. ORDER IN ADVANCE AND GET A FREE
COPY IF YOU’RE A PREMIUM MEMBER. THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY,
INSTEAD OF WHINING ABOUT VANISHING SUMMER DAYS, I’M
PLANNING THEM OUT. I’LL CELEBRATE WITH MY PALS, THE
BEACH BOYS. ♫ I WISH THEY ALL COULD BE
CALIFORNIA ♫ ♫ I WISH THEY CALL COULD BE
CALIFORNIA ♫ ♫ I WISH THEY ALL COULD BE
♫ THE WEST COAST HAS THE SUNSHINE ♫
>> ALL RIGHT. THE GUYS WILL BE AT JONES BEACH
ON JULY 5th. THEY PUT OUT THE BEST SUMMER
MUSIC EVER SO HERE IS THE TIP, GET YOUR CALENDAR, PLAN AHEAD
FOR THE THINGS YOU WANT TO DO, AVOID THE CHAOS, HAVE A NICE
THAT’S IT FOR US TONIGHT. CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS
